summary: Provides a fused 1‑dimensional batch‑normalization layer tailored for Conformer architectures, acting as a direct substitute for the standard BatchNorm1d while applying a simple affine projection to boost accuracy during text‑to‑speech fine‑tuning.
business_intent: Improve the quality and efficiency of speech synthesis models by offering a more accurate and computationally streamlined normalization component for fine‑tuning pipelines.
